H0.text: Increasing the size of the two magnets will cause a decrease in the force of attraction between them.

H1.text: Increasing the distance between the two magnets will cause a decrease in the force of attraction between them.

H2.text: Changing the color of the two magnets is a factor that will cause a decrease in the force of attraction between them.

H3.text: Changing the texture of the two magnets will cause a decrease in the force of attraction between them.

A4.text: The strength of a magnetic field always decreases with distance from the magnetic source
